verses.verse: Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H8085>hearken,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H3925>teach<s%> you, for to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> you.

Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall ye <S%H1639>diminish<s%> aught <S%H4480>from<s%> it, that ye may <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> you.

Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> because of <S%H1187>Baal-peor:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H1187>Baal-peor,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> you.
But <S%H859>ye<s%> that did <S%H1695>cleave<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> are <S%H2416>alive<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> of you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have <S%H3925>taught<s%> you <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> even <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me, that ye should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H7130>in<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

Keep <S%H8104><s%> therefore and <S%H6213>do<s%> them; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and your <S%H998>understanding<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>nations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7535>Surely<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is a <S%H2450>wise<s%> and <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is there so <S%H1419>great,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> hath <S%H430>God<s%> so <S%H7138>nigh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is in <S%H3605>all<s%> things that we <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> him for?

And <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is there so <S%H1419>great,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> hath <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> so <S%H6662>righteous<s%> as <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day?<s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3966>diligently,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> thou <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> and <S%H6435>lest<s%> they <S%H5493>depart<s%> from thy <S%H4480>heart<s%> <S%H3824><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life:<s%> but <S%H3045>teach<s%> them thy <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H1121>sons;<s%>

Especially the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H5975>stoodest<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Gather me the people <S%H6950>together,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5971><s%> and I will make them <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H127>earth,<s%> and that they may <S%H3925>teach<s%> their <S%H1121>children.<s%>

And ye came <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> with <S%H6205>darkness,<s%> <S%H6051>clouds,<s%> and thick <S%H6205>darkness.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H784>fire:<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H1697>words,<s%> but <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8544>similitude;<s%> <S%H2108>only<s%> ye heard a <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

And he <S%H5046>declared<s%> unto <S%H853>you<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H6213>perform,<s%> even <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1697>commandments;<s%> and he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> you <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> that ye might <S%H6213>do<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> go <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

Take ye therefore good <S%H8104>heed<s%> <S%H3966><s%> unto <S%H5315>yourselves;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> ye <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H8544>similitude<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the fire: <S%H784><s%>

Lest <S%H6435><s%> ye <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> yourselves, and <S%H6213>make<s%> you a graven <S%H6459>image,<s%> the <S%H8544>similitude<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5566>figure,<s%> the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5347>female,<s%>

The <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3671>winged<s%> <S%H6833>fowl<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5774>flieth<s%> in the <S%H8064>air,<s%>

The <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of any <S%H3605>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> on the <S%H127>ground,<s%> the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1710>fish<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H4480>beneath<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%>

And <S%H6435>lest<s%> thou lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> unto <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and when thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> shouldest be <S%H5080>driven<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> them, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H2505>divided<s%> <S%H853><s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>nations<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> you, and brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H4480>furnace,<s%> <S%H3564><s%> even out of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> unto him a <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as ye are <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Furthermore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with me for your <S%H5921>sakes,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> that I should <S%H1115>not<s%> go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and that I should <S%H1115>not<s%> go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee for an inheritance: <S%H5159><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> must <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> I must <S%H369>not<s%> go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> but <S%H859>ye<s%> shall go <S%H5674>over,<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>that<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> unto yourselves, <S%H6435>lest<s%> ye <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you, and <S%H6213>make<s%> you a graven <S%H6459>image,<s%> or the <S%H8544>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> thing, <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>forbidden<s%> thee.
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H398>consuming<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> even a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt <S%H3205>beget<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> and ye shall have remained <S%H3462>long<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and shall <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> yourselves, and <S%H6213>make<s%> a graven <S%H6459>image,<s%> or the <S%H8544>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> thing, and shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> to provoke him to anger: <S%H3707><s%>

I <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H5749>witness<s%> against you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> ye shall <S%H4118>soon<s%> utterly <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H6><s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whereunto<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, <S%H3588>but<s%> shall utterly be <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%> <S%H8045><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6327>scatter<s%> you among the <S%H5971>nations,<s%> and ye shall be <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H4962>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> you.

And <S%H8033>there<s%> ye shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H398>eat,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7306>smell.<s%>

But if from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou shalt <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> thou shalt <S%H4672>find<s%> him, <S%H3588>if<s%> thou <S%H1875>seek<s%> him with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

When thou art in <S%H6862>tribulation,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> are <S%H4672>come<s%> upon thee, even in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> if thou <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and shalt be <S%H8085>obedient<s%> unto his <S%H6963>voice;<s%>

(For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H7349>merciful<s%> <S%H410>God;)<s%> he will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7503>forsake<s%> thee, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7843>destroy<s%> thee, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto them.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that are <S%H7223>past,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, <S%H4480>since<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and ask from the one <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H7097>other,<s%> <S%H8064><s%> whether there hath <S%H1961>been<s%> any such thing as <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> is, <S%H176>or<s%> hath been <S%H8085>heard<s%> like <S%H3644>it?<s%>

Did ever <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and <S%H2421>live?<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> hath <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5254>attempted<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> him a <S%H1471>nation<s%> from the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H7130><s%> of another <S%H1471>nation,<s%> by <S%H4531>temptations,<s%> by <S%H226>signs,<s%> and by <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> and by <S%H4421>war,<s%> and by a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and by a stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and by <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terrors,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> for you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes?<s%>

Unto <S%H859>thee<s%> it was <S%H7200>showed,<s%> that thou mightest <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H430>God;<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H5750>else<s%> <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H905><s%> him.

Out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> he made thee to <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> that he might <S%H3256>instruct<s%> thee: and <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> he <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire;<s%> and thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H784>fire.<s%>
